at.irian.ankor.application

Interface Application

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimalsServerApplication, BaseApplication, CollaborationSingleRootApplication, ConsoleApplication, RatesServerApplication, SimpleClientApplication, SimpleSingleRootApplication, TodoServerApplication

    public interface Application

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object createModel(String modelName, Map<String,Object> connectParameters, RefContext refContext)

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this application

      • supportsModel

        boolean supportsModel(String modelName)
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        Returns:
        true, if this Application supports models with the given name

      • lookupModel

        Object lookupModel(String modelName,
                 Map<String,Object> connectParameters)
        Lookup a model by one or more (application specific) connect parameters. Typical parameters are:
        • username
        • browser cookie
        • device id
        • ...
        Applications are free to just return null on every call to this method. Returning null is the expected behaviour for applications that do not support restoring (user) sessions.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        connectParameters - lookup criteria
        Returns:
        existing Model instance or null if there is no matching model yet

      • createModel

        Object createModel(String modelName,
                 Map<String,Object> connectParameters,
                 RefContext refContext)
        Create a new instance of a model root that matches the given model name and the (application specific) connect parameters.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        connectParameters - (optional) connect parameters
        refContext - RefContext for the corresponding ModelSession
        Returns:
        newly created model root

      • releaseModel

        void releaseModel(String modelName,
                Object modelRoot)
        Free all resources that might have been allocated for the given model.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        modelRoot - root of model instance to free

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Free all resources associated by this Application.
